baseCurrency.externalId.description: Select the base currency on which this exchange rate is based.If you use subsidiary management and consolidation, you can select the base currency for any subsidiary to which you have access. If you do not use subsidiary management and consolidation, your base currency is shown here.
baseCurrency.externalId.name: baseCurrency.externalId

baseCurrency.internalId.description: Select the base currency on which this exchange rate is based.If you use subsidiary management and consolidation, you can select the base currency for any subsidiary to which you have access. If you do not use subsidiary management and consolidation, your base currency is shown here.
baseCurrency.internalId.name: baseCurrency.internalId

baseCurrency.name.description: Select the base currency on which this exchange rate is based.If you use subsidiary management and consolidation, you can select the base currency for any subsidiary to which you have access. If you do not use subsidiary management and consolidation, your base currency is shown here.
baseCurrency.name.name: baseCurrency.name

effectiveDate.description: Set the date this exchange rate becomes effective in the Effective Date field.
effectiveDate.name: effectiveDate

exchangeRate.description: Enter an exchange rate for this currency against the base currency of this company, or if you use OneWorld, for this currency against the base currency of the root parent subsidiary.For example, if your company is located in Canada and you are defining the U.S. dollar, and the current exchange rate is 1.02 Canadian dollars to 1.00 U.S. dollar, the Default Exchange Rate for the U.S. dollar is 1.02/1.00, or 1.02.This rate is the basis for rates in the Currency Exchange Rates table that are used in foreign currency transactions. If you use OneWorld, this rate also is the basis for rates in the Consolidated Exchange Rates table that are used in consolidated financials.For more information, see the help topic Setting Currency Exchange Rates.
exchangeRate.name: exchangeRate

transactionCurrency.externalId.description: Select a foreign currency in the Currency field.For example, if you are setting the exchange rate for the Euro to your base currency, the U.S. dollar, select the name of your base currency, USA in the Base Currency field and then select Euro in the Currency field.
transactionCurrency.externalId.name: transactionCurrency.externalId

transactionCurrency.internalId.description: Select a foreign currency in the Currency field.For example, if you are setting the exchange rate for the Euro to your base currency, the U.S. dollar, select the name of your base currency, USA in the Base Currency field and then select Euro in the Currency field.
transactionCurrency.internalId.name: transactionCurrency.internalId

transactionCurrency.name.name: transactionCurrency.name

type.value.name: type.value
